name: Counter-Terrorism Operations
description: Tactics for neutralizing terrorist threats and preventing asymmetric attacks.

cards.title: Tracking and Surveillance of Threats
cards.description: Monitoring enemy movements and gathering actionable intelligence.
cards.bulletpoints: Utilize electronic surveillance, infiltrate hostile networks, and predict attacks
cards.summaryText: Focuses on surveillance nets, network penetration, and predictive intel to preempt strikes.

cards.title: Tactical Intervention and Rapid Response
cards.description: Executing precision operations to eliminate high-value threats.
cards.bulletpoints: Use breaching tactics, strategic containment, and rapid engagement protocols
cards.summaryText: Covers entry tactics, containment strategies, and speed-of-force maneuvers against priority targets.
